ResearchProjectDef.label: Thornsworth Holography
ResearchProjectDef.description:
The holographam artist Thornsworth produced masterpieces for many years despite gradual blindness. When holographic data storage was perfected, he was instrumental in developing Holographic Item Storage.
Allows items to be stored in a Digital Storage Unit, which can transmit and receive wirelessly to any I/O port on map.

You will be missed, Thornsworth.
